author: Tim Daniels
title: MSU DL Fabien Lovett Enters Transfer Portal After Criticizing Mike Leach Tweet
description: Mississippi State defensive tackle Fabien  Lovett   announced  Friday he's entered the NCAA transfer portal after criticizing a  coronavirus -related meme posted by Bulldogs head coach Mike Leach...
content:
Rogelio V. Solis/Associated Press
Mississippi State defensive tackle Fabien Lovett announced Friday he's entered the NCAA transfer portal after criticizing a coronavirus-related meme posted by Bulldogs head coach Mike Leach.
ESPN's Mark Schlabach reported L… [+423 chars]
